name: DEPRECATED - Flickr WideScreen - GM - Commented ON
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
DEPRECATED - It's better for A WIDE SCREEN (1920x1080)! ► What is do? : Adaptation for : " Flickr Commented On (USO Mirror) " TWEAK its "comment balloon" ICONS : More new small icon, Color, Size and Position .... IMPORTANT (2020): It should be better to use now (more updated) ▶ My Flickr ALLinONE styles: - Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 1): the first and principal to install - Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 2): Adaptation for GM (Adaptation for some great Userscripts i use a lot , since a long time...), and Additional styles for some some unused pages. - - Flickr WideScreen - Dark & Grey ▶ Please Comment and give Feedback if you like this Style :-)

user.name: decembre
user.about: I build Userstyles principally for : - Firefox. - WideScreen (1920x1080) adaptation (More things in the window, less scrolling) - Dark Gray style (better for night surfing) - Site Navigation (Tweaks its Interface by moving many things) - ByPass Sites Limitations Some example: - Flickr' Userstyles by decembre - Userstyles : Userstyles TableView+Enhancer - Dark-Grey - Mozilla : Mozilla Addon Widescreen - Yahoo : Yahoo New Mail - Simply Dark And Gray - YouTube: Youtube WideScreen (New Design Polymer) - Streaming : Stream - DuckDuckGo - Streaming Helper - Télévision: Télérama WideScreen - New design - Search: DuckDuckGo - Multi-Columns GooGle - Multi-Columns Dark and Gray Note: Due to Userstyles.org limitation, some of my userstyles are minified (to reduce their size) by this online tool: CSS Minifier But now they are unreadable easily, sorry. You can watch their readable userstyle on Usertyles.World [USw] (or better use it!), because USw have not limit size when you post Many of my Userstyle are published on Userstyles.World [USw] too : Decembre [Userstyles.World [USw] It's a new site with a great accessibility and no limitation in size for the userstyle posted. I use some useful things like... Addon / extensions: Userscripts : Decembre - My Favoris [GreasyFork] Just for info (deprecated): ★ MY ★ Installed ★ GM ★ Surf (USO Mirror) FireFox Addons : Decembre Favorite Add-ons I try to adapt/create some Greasemonkey script: in GreasyFork. By example: - USERSTYLES - TABLES Sorter SIMPLE - Flickr - AUTO More Mini Thumbnail in Photo page Some my userstyles are published here too, by example: - Flickr WideScreen - BigONE I publish my tweaks here: Decembre's Pastebin I spend a lot of time on Userstyles but too: - Flickr and my pools in it: > Portrait★Faces > Portrait★Faces★Open Minded

obsoletion_message:
IMPORTANT (2020):
It should be better to use now (more updated)
▶ My Flickr ALLinONE userstyles.
